products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Trinity (blackout), shadow - roller blind when you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems,
products.productdescription: When you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems, and your dark fabric is actually a natural charcoal that brings any space to life.We love the idea of pairing shadow with light lively natural shades to provide some natural balance and contrast. Light woods and hessian canvases would be a couple of ideas you might think about exploring a little further.

products.metadescription: Burlington, shadow - vertical blind in a soft dove grey, the burlington shadow offers subtle style, with its solid, strong fabric and pretty abstract patterning. The vertical sheets hang neatly, able to be pulled across or tilted according to your light a
products.productdescription: In a soft dove grey, the burlington shadow offers subtle style, with its solid, strong fabric and pretty abstract patterning. The vertical sheets hang neatly, able to be pulled across or tilted according to your light and privacy needs.Use the shadow as part of a grey and white colour scheme, which gives understated style and a fresh, airy look, perfect for a guest bedroom or home office. Go for clean, contemporary furniture to keep the feel modern and welcoming.

products.title: Grande, Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Grande, shadow - vertical blind fashion an elegant dcor scheme with the grande shadow, where exquisite silky threads merge to parade a creative and captivating display of textured waves. This attractive blind also flaunts a calming, seafoam hue with a co
products.productdescription: Fashion an elegant dcor scheme with the grande shadow, where exquisite silky threads merge to parade a creative and captivating display of textured waves. This attractive blind also flaunts a calming, seafoam hue with a contemporary grey tinge. It is perfectly suited to many surroundings, and furthermore, contains adjustable slats to allow the desired amount of ventilation and privacy.Create a sophisticated dining area by matching the shadow with a soothing colour palette of whites, olives, and avocados. Stick to a milder tone on the walls to form a modest setting with coordinating deeper tone fabrics and complementing platinum shimmers.

products.productdescription: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too.The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior. Perfect for that luxurious look and feel.

products.title: Garden City, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Garden city, shadow - roller blind garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on
products.productdescription: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes. Chrome fixtures in the ensuite and plenty of crisp whites and dark greys are all you need to create a minimalist masterpiece.

products.title: Visage, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Visage, shadow - roller blind visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you ne
products.productdescription: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave.Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom. It's all about embracing simple colours and homely textures, so give some thought to your options.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Shadows
products.metadescription: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour allows it to be paired in a variety of ways.
products.productdescription: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour is versatile and can be paired in a variety of ways. Its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Birdsong, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Birdsong, shadow - roman blind with a gentle off-white canvas and an artistic flourish of naturally inspired shades, birdsong shadow is the epitome of style meets substance. The shades of grey flow effortlessly into one another to create a timeless look t
products.productdescription: With a gentle off-white canvas and an artistic flourish of naturally inspired shades, birdsong shadow is the epitome of style meets substance. The shades of grey flow effortlessly into one another to create a timeless look that will never grow old. Match birdsong shadow with some simple country touches like a light beige rug on a wooden floor and a hessian canvas on the wall to create the homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. Perfect for inviting your friends and family in to put their feet up and unwind in the evening.  Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Silver birch, shadow - roman blind with a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across th
products.productdescription: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral. That way you'll be able to let the art really come to the fore. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
